content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore, refueled with coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Mining and Smelting Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal, refueled with coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors When Inserting Items Without Inventory
- Ensure that the inventory contains the required items before attempting to insert them into another entity. This will prevent errors related to "No iron-ore to insert from your inventory."

### Errors Due to Full Chests
- Regularly check and empty chests at drop positions to prevent mining drills from stopping due to full storage. This will ensure continuous operation of mining drills.

### Errors Due to Lack of Ingredients in Furnace
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt by regularly supplying them with raw materials. This will prevent furnaces from stopping with a "no ingredients to smelt" warning.
